mapper.sql: SELECT member_email, member_password, member_name, member_nick, member_address, member_phone, member_birthday, member_type, member_status, member_reg_date FROM MEMBER
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE member_email=#{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(member_email, member_password, member_name, member_nick, member_address, member_phone, member_birthday) VALUES(#{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberNick}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberBirthday})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET member_password=#{memberPassword}, member_name=#{memberName}, member_address=#{memberAddress}, member_phone=#{memberPhone}, member_birthday=#{memberBirthday} WHERE member_email=#{memberEmail}
